mapper.insert: insert into member(idx, name, password, email) values(seq_member.nextval,#{name},#{password},#{email})
mapper.update: update member set authkey=#{authkey} where idx=#{idx} and email=#{email}
update member set authstatus=#{authstatus} where idx=#{idx} and authkey=#{authkey}
update member set name=#{name}, id=#{id}, password=#{password}, phone=#{phone}, grade=#{grade}, point=0, admin=0 where email=#{email}
mapper.insert: update member set point=#{point}, grade=#{grade} where idx=#{idx}
